Headline: CNN 10 - December 2, 2019
Article_Body: December 2, 2019 Iraq's prime minister resigns after months of protests. Online sales set a record on Black Friday. Musicians help rehabilitate inmates by teaching them to compose and play classical music. And a new kind of "skin" helps robots react to changes around them. All of these stories and more are featured on CNN 10 today! TRANSCRIPT Click here to access the printable version of today's CNN 10 transcript. CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society. Thank you for using CNN 10
